message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $9,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $9,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $9,250?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand your position, I would still like to propose a lower price of $9,000. This is closer to what I am able to offer at this time.
